Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws or Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing, Can Poison a hit target dealing additional damage

Other Actions.Action 1: Scare, The Quasit targets one creature and attempts to magically frighten it
Other Actions.Action 2: Invisibility, The Quasit magically turns invisible

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Quasit can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a bat (speed 10ft, fly 40ft), a centipede (speed 40ft, climb 40ft) or a toad (speed 40ft, swim 40ft), or back into its true form.  It keeps the same statistics besides movement speeds as noted
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Quasit has advantage on saving throws agains spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Bond, This Quasit serves another creature as a familiar, forming a telepathic bond with its willing master.  While bonded, the master shares the Quasit's Magic Resistance trait

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
